A day in the life of Jumana & Nina

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1417&user=10620> 	







Discover the behind-the-scenes of a day in the life of Jumana & Nina from Group Communications.

Follow along as they take us through their day on our Group’s Instagram stories <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1417&user=10620> !

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

Molton Brown - Build Your Own Gift

We’re excited to launch our Online Exclusive – Build Your Own Gift feature for Molton Brown in the UAE and KSA!

Customers can now hand-pick their favorite products to create the perfect, personalized gift – all online.
